main event: A metallic object was discovered in a residential area of Wayne, Michigan on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was approximately 3 feet in diameter and 8 inches thick,It was silver-colored with a rough, crystalline surface texture,Local police were notified about the object at approximately 1800 hours,The object crashed through the roof of a detached garage,The U.S. Air Force and FBI were contacted and dispatched teams to investigate.
